body.name: 5 Pack Mop Broom Holder Wall Mount, Sturdy Stainless Steel Broom Holder Screw Drilled and Self Adhesive for Home, Kitchen, Garden, Garage Storage
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 16 mins
features: ✨【Sturdy Grippness & Non Scratchy】304SUS Material made the broom organizer more sturdy and durable,soft rubber rollers provide strong grippness and triangle structure would protect your mop handle not scratch.

✨【2 Ways Installation】The broom grippers come with 2 ways installtion, Screw Drilling(15KG max.loading)and Self-Adhesive(5KG max.loading), easy to assemble, feel ease to choose any installtion you like.

✨【5 Pack Pack Broom Holder】5 PCs single mop broom holder in package, which can be assembled in different area in your house, reasonably organize mops , brooms, umbrellas, and some tools in indoor or outdoor.
✨【NO-SLIDE Design】 With rolling rubber ball that make sure the broom and mop will not fall out, including wet mop, dirty rakes, stick vacuum and other hardware tools.
✨【Save Space】The Heavy Duty mop holder can help you save space and well-organized, perfect for the kitchen, closet, bathroom,garage, utility room, office and ect.
body.description: Why Choose Nipoko Broom Holder ? Are you tired of messy corner for your home? Nipoko committed to home organization and storage, make life convenient. Using our updated broom holder can help you tidy and clean your garage，bathroom，kitchen，warehouse，outdoor, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tired of tripping over brooms
reviews.reviewText: I was getting tired of tripping over brooms and mops on the side of our floating bar. These have been an excellent purchase and they are holding up well to all of the salt water, sun and rain!I was worried that these would start to rust and run down our white walls, but they have been up for several weeks now and are still in excellent condition. This is a miracle for our environment.I like the maneuverability of each one being individual. It allowed us to space them for the needs of our wall. They hold every size of handle for our brooms and mops with no slippage.I highly recommend these holders!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good broom handle gripper
reviews.reviewText: This broom holder is sturdy and good looking; it wouldn't be out of place in an entryway. It is made of a bright stainless steel with two rubber rollers, a rubber pad at the back to prevent the broom from hitting the back too hard, and even stainless steel caps that cover the screw heads. None of my mops or broom handles merit this degree of care, but other folks may wish to use the holder in a location that requires such a design.The holder comes with two different methods of attachment: 3M double-sided sticky pads, and screws. The seller also includes anchors for drywall installation. I was reluctant to install the holder with the double-sided pads only because the spring of the rubber rollers is pretty tight and it takes a fair bit of tugging on the broom handle to remove from the holder. Instead, I screwed the holder directly into wood, and it is holding just fine.The only complaint I have is that the screw heads sheared right off when I put them in (very carefully) with a power screwdriver. Because I had to use my own screws, I couldn't use the ingenious caps that they provide to cover the screw heads. Other than the screwhead issue, the installation was a breeze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good and grippy.
reviews.reviewText: ... Or, as a card that comes with these broom holders says, "STRONG GRIPPNESS."Oh, well; English is hard, and paying a few yuan to get some who knows English to write your copy for you is apparently even harder.Anyway these holders are good and grippy. What's more, they can be adjusted to hold thicker or thinner handles by bending the metal arms in or out. I've tried out a lot of mop-hanging gadgets over the years, and I think the design of these is the best I've seen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy Install With Multiple Options
reviews.reviewText: I'd specifically picked this product as a space-saving tool for storing outdoor brooms and a snow shovel in our mudroom. I wasn't particularly concerned with the cosmetic look of the holder and didn't have access to a power drill at the time, so I opted to bypass the anchors and simply screwed the holders directly into the wall. Obviously it will depend on the material, but I was easily able to screw the holders into the mudroom wall manually with a standard philips-head screwdriver. I don't foresee an issue with this method (wood splitting, etc), but will update if any occur. I am pleased to have multiple options for install that are all relatively simple. The holders themselves appear decently manufactured; nothing cheap or flimsy. The product description only lists mops and brooms but I've attempted to hang our snow shovel from them as well and thus far it works just as well. The handle on the shovel is a bit wider and doesn't slip into the holder as completely, but the grip makes up for it and has been holding sturdy for a few days now. Having my items up off the floor has already improved the amount of available space in the mudroom and will likely help to keep the bristles on the brooms clean while being outdoors. Definitely worthwhile for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: No more brooms falling on the floor. I love how sturdy it holds the mops and brooms. I really like how adhesive the sticky takes are so I don’t have to drill holes in the walls. What got my vote is that they’re separate. I have them where they belong bathroom kitchen and wherever I have something for it to hold on to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and heavy duty
reviews.reviewText: I am super pleased with these wall mounted mop and broom holders. I liked them so much because they are all able to be mounted individually into place, plus you can mount them with screws to make them extra sturdy and heavy duty - they hold more weight than the typical wall mounted mop or broom holders out there for this reason. The holders are also very sleek and attractive looking in addition to being so practical.They are basically flawless, and I’ve had zero problems with them so far. They’ve been perfect and have made getting my home more organized so easy. Five stars for sure. A+++++ highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These adhere very well. No damage to walls. I didn't drill into my wall. Keeps my brooms and mops tidy and off the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flexible mounting solution
reviews.reviewText: These work as advertised. They have a rather sturdy backer can come with strong 3M adhesive strips if you don't want to drill. I personally wouldn't use the 3M strips, but if you're just hanging a broom or mop in a closet, I expect it would be more than strong enough. The bracket has a fairly stiff & strong grip with a couple large rubber bumpers on the ends to help hold. The bracket metal is a bit thinner than I'd like to see to call it "sturdy" -- or to have faith it will hold up to years of use. But it went up fine and holds basically all the handles tools I threw at it, so no complaints right now.
